name: Time and Tales
description:
This is a tool. A procedural story generator. Right-mouse clicks to generate endless stories and tales. 

STORY

I was trapped inside a book and I can't escape. I'm Time and I have many tales to share. From the rise of Kandora the empire to the exodus of the first arcane order. I seem it all. Now I invite you to have your own tales!

DEVELOPER'S NOTE

I would love to see which stories you came up with followed by a picture from the game. This is the first time I make a proc-gen project by myself, I'm super proud. Thanks for playing :)
